title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process does not work as expected.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file.
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.

Expected behavior: The files should synchronize successfully.

Actual behavior: The synchronization process does not work as expected.
